pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 5, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, July 5, 2017:

Dublin, Ireland

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Edinburgh, United Kingdom.

Dublin International Airport

Edinburg, United Kingdom

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Edinburgh, United Kingdom.

Edinburgh Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of arrival

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the University of Edinburgh Convocation Ceremony.

University of Edinburgh

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will be received in audience by Her Majesty The Queen.

Private Apartments of Her Majesty The Queen
Holyrood Palace

Note for media:

  • Restricted pool photo opportunity


Note: all times local
